data.title: AppleÂ TV (UK)
data.meta_description: A brilliant scientist is called in when all else fails to solve scientific crises.
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Resurrection

Dr Jacob Hood, special science adviser to the FBI, investigates when evidence suggests that someone is attempting human cloning.

40 min Â· 9 Oct 2008 Caution

EPISODE 2

Cardiac

When several healthy 11-year-old boys die of heart attacks, Dr Jacob Hood is called upon to determine the cause and prevent further deaths.

42 min Â· 16 Oct 2008 Caution

EPISODE 3

Agro

When a family breakfast is contaminated, leading to life-threatening paralysis, Dr Jacob Hood sets out to find the cause of the poisonings.

39 min Â· 23 Oct 2008 Caution

EPISODE 4

Savant

Severely autistic teenagers across the country are vanishing, only to reappear a month later exhibiting symptoms of savant syndrome.

42 min Â· 30 Oct 2008 Caution

EPISODE 5

Containment

Professor Hood is called to prevent a lethal virus from becoming a global pandemic. A crypt worker was first diagnosed with the virus and the archaeological site had to be closed down.

41 min Â· 6 Nov 2008 Caution
